overview: R端ckkehr (Return) consists of two short films inspired by the director's youth: "Die R端ckkehr des alten Herrn" (The return of trhe old lord) is a nostalgic dive into the memories of an old man who entrusts his grandson with stories of his youth.  "Mein seliger Onkel" (My blessed uncle) then tells the story of the boy and his adventurous uncle. Both stories take place in a picturesque small town.
title: Die R端ckkehr des alten Herrn
